policy_description_BlockAboutAddons.message: Block access to the add-ons manager (about:addons)

policy_description_BlockAboutConfig.message: Block access to the browser configuration (about:config)

policy_description_BlockAboutProfiles.message: Block access to the in-content profile manager (about:profiles)

policy_description_BlockAboutSupport.message: Block access to the troubleshooting information page (about:support)

policy_description_DisableFeedbackComman.message: Disable the menu items "Submit Feedback" and "Report Deceptive Site" in the help menu

policy_description_DisableFirefoxAccount.message: Disable Firefox Account based services, including Firefox Sync

policy_description_DisableFirefoxScreens.message: Disable the built-in screenshot tool (Firefox Screenshots)

policy_description_DisableForgetButton.message: Disable the "Forget" toolbar button which can be used to forget the last browsing history

policy_description_DisableFormHistory.message: Disable the form and search bar history

policy_description_DisablePocket.message: Disable the integration of Pocket, a service by Mozilla

policy_description_DisableProfileImport.message: Disable the "Import data from another browser" menu item in the library

policy_description_DisableProfileRefresh.message: Disable the "Refresh Firefox" button in about:support

policy_description_DisableSafeMode.message: Disable the ability to restart Firefox with add-ons disabled (safe mode)

policy_description_DisableSetDesktopBack.message: Disable the feature to set an image as desktop background
